PreparerUSAddress.AddressLine1Txt: TWO LIBERTY PL 50 S 16TH ST STE

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: BLAIR ACADEMY SEEKS TO ENROLL TALENTED YOUNG MEN AND WOMEN FROM DIVERSE BACKGROUNDS. IN A RESIDENTIAL SETTING, BLAIR ACADEMY IS COMMITTED TO PROVIDE A LIBERAL ARTS EDUCATION AND TO PROMOTE THE DEVELOPMENT OF PERSONAL AND INTELLECTUAL DISCIPLINE AS PREPARATION FOR CONTINUED STUDY AT SELECTIVE COLLEGES AND FOR A LIFE OF RESPONSIBLILTY AND SERVICE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: BLAIR ACADEMY IS A COEDUCATIONAL BOARDING SCHOOL LOCATED 65 MILES WEST OF NEW YORK CITY IN THE FOOTHILLS OF THE POCONO MOUNTAINS. IN ITS 175TH YEAR, BLAIR CONTINUES TO OFFER A SUPERIOR ACADEMIC COLLEGE-PREPARATORY PROGRAM WHILE HOLDING FIRMLY TO ITS TRADITION OF BEING A COMMUNITY FULLY FOCUSED ON THE DEVELOPMENT OF EACH INDIVIDUAL STUDENT. IN THIS ENVIRONMENT, STUDENTS LEARN TO ADVOCATE FOR THEMSELVES, BECOME SERVICE-MINDED, AND DEVELOP THE LEADERSHIP SKILLS NECESSARY FOR SUCCESS IN COLLEGE AND BEYOND.
IRS990.Desc: BLAIR ACADEMY SERVES 465 STUDENTS FROM 29 COUNTRIES AND 26 DIFFERENT STATES. BLAIR OFFERS A RICH AND CHALLENGING CURRICULUM, WORLD CLASS PROGRAMS FOR ATHLETES AND ARTISTS OF ALL ABILITIES AND AN ARRAY OF MEANINGFUL LEADERSHIP, TRAVEL, AND SERVICE OPPORTUNITIES. WE INVEST IN DISCOVERING AND UNDERSTANDING OUR STUDENTS' TALENTS, INTERESTS AND PERSONALITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT HAS REVIEWED THE TAX POSITIONS FOR EACH OF THE OPEN TAX YEARS (JUNE 30, 2019 - JUNE 30, 2021) OR EXPECTED TO BE TAKEN IN THE ACADEMY'S TAX RETURN FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2022 AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT THERE ARE NO SIGNIFICANT UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT WOULD REQUIRE RECOGNITION IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STUDENT AID AMOUNTS ARE APPLIED AGAINST TUITION COSTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRUSTEES ROBERT AND CORNELIUS SIGETY ARE BROTHERS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 REVIEW PROCESS INVOLVES A THOROUGH REVIEW BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND BUDGET/AUDIT COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO SUBMISSION OF THE RETURN. ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS THAT ARISE FROM THIS REVIEW ARE BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. THE COMPLETED 990 TAX RETURN IS SHARED WITH THE ENTIRE BOARD OF TRUSTEES FOR THEIR REVIEW AND COMMENT PRIOR TO SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH INDIVIDUAL OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ANNUALLY RECEIVES A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND IS REQUIRED TO REVIEW THE POLICY AND REPORT ANY POSSIBLE CONFLICTS. COPIES OF ALL CONFLICT OF INTEREST RESPONSES ARE SENT TO SECRETARY OF THE BOARD FOR REVIEW AND RESPONSE IF NECESSARY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ANNUALLY REVIEWS THE COMPENSATION OF THE HEADMASTER IN RELATION TO A PEER GROUP OF SCHOOLS AND BASED UPON THIS ANALYSIS IN CONJUNCTION WITH A ANNUAL PERFORMANCE EVALUATION THE COMPENSATION LEVEL IS ESTABLISHED. THE COMPENSATION LEVEL ESTABLISED BY THE COMMITTEE, FOR THE HEADMASTER, IS SHARED WITH THE REMAINDER OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE ALSO REVIEWS ALL ADMINISTRATIVE/KEY EMPLOYEE SALARIES THAT ARE ESTABLISHED BY THE HEADMASTER IN COMPARISON TO A PEER GROUP TO ENSURE THAT THEY ARE COMPARABLE AND COMMENSURATE WITH THE JOB RESPONSIBILITIES OF EACH INDIVIDUAL. ANY CONCERNS BY THE COMMITTEE ARE BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THE HEADMASTER.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
